text: Yi zhenzhu de panduan, yue shu que shi shi'er ge yue, zhenzhu chuangzao tiandi zhi ri, yi jilu zai tian jing zhong. Qizhong you si ge jin yue, zhe que shi zhengjiao. Gu nimen zai jin yue li buyao zi qi. Yi wu pei zhu de renqunqi er jingong nimen, nimen ye jiu yingdang qun qi er dikang tamen. Nimen yingdang zhidao, zhenzhu shi he jingwei zhe zai yiqi de.
